text:
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
Page Two
August 4, 1952
Perhaps 1111 see you in New York the latter part of
August. I'll be there for AEJ meeting, John Jay Hall, Columbia
University.
In the meantime, sir, I leave (not for Europe) for a
cottage in Virginia, and I hope everything runs better without
me than with me.
Regards,
FES:fmh
I^rank E. Schooley
Treasurer, NAEB
